‘Power is everything in the ninja world,’ Sakura thought to herself. ‘Given that he comes from a ninja clan as well as what happened to him, it only makes sense that Sasuke would be so focused on gaining power. He is so focused on it that he ignores everything else, even me. To him, I’m nothing but a distraction, to draw him away from his path to power. But, what if I were strong? Then I he would finally see me, finally pay attention to me. And I could make him love me.’

"I'm being followed."

It had been about a week since the graduation exam. Naruto, through one bizarre incident following another, found himself failing the examination, mastering a forbidden technique, and then being allowed to graduate anyway. But ever since that time, he couldn't help but feel like someone had been watching him. "Followed? Are you out of your mind?"

The boy shook his head at the dog-ninja Kiba, his faithful dog Akamaru at his side, looking on equally confused at the blonde's confession. The other boy, a rather portly ninja named Chouji, nodded in agreement with Kiba as he munched on a bag of potato chips.

"I just need you to follow me around for half an hour, make sure that I'm not being followed. I'll pay you guys."

"Why us?" Kiba asked.

After depositing some money into the hands of both boys, they nodded their heads in agreement. It seemed simple enough, follow the paranoid troublemaker around for half an hour, make sure this wasn't another one of his stupid pranks, and then go home. But what they didn't realize was the figure in the shadows that was observing them with her powerful eyes.

Hinata Hyuga grimaced as she saw the two ninjas observing him, looking around for her. 1142.content:
It was a little past midnight in Konoha. The village was asleep for the most part, but like any other hidden village there were still plenty of people active. Some didn't want to sleep, some had to work night shifts, and then there were people whose minds refused to shut down and grant them rest.

For Uzumaki Naruto, the latter was applicable. Sitting with his back to a tree, the outskirts of the Forest of Death was the spot he visited for times like these. Today had been like any other day; he got up early, trained a bit and then went on a mission with his team.

Yet there had been some... hiccups.

The mission was a total failure.

The worst part? It happened because he'd been too distracted, which led to the target getting away. Kakashi-sensei said it wasn't a big deal, seeing as it was only a low-ranked C mission, but the disappointment was there. When they got back home, Tsunade had berated him for said mistake, adding fuel to his already bruised self-esteem.

But what hurt the most was Sakura's disappointing gaze. No words, no shouting, no anything; just that look.

Afterwards, they'd gone their separate ways, with him just staying at home all alone. Times like these were when a hidden part of Naruto rose to the surface. Beneath his cheery behavior, there was a sadness that had been there since his childhood, and had yet to leave the young genin.

Not that these feelings were anything new to Naruto; he'd been wrestling with them ever since he was a small kid, shunned by the villagers. Of course, things got better. He had a team now. Also a lot of friends, who didn't hate or avoid him.

So why was he still so letdown?

Well, a big part of him longed for that close contact that others had. Not just in the sense of wanting to be loved in a relationship -- still no luck with Sakura on that front -- but also the type of love that only a family could give.

He'd long given up on been taken in by a family, so the only option left was to start one of his own. Now that was a whole different story. Aside from being too young to have kids, Naruto didn't know anyone that would want to go out with him.

Sakura? She seemed to be infatuated with that bastard Sasuke. Ino? They didn't really hang out that much. Hinata? The poor girl seemed to faint every single time she saw him. His thoughts would often drift off to the older women he knew -- he was a teenager after all. Then he'd imagine himself being in a relationship with Tsunade, whose beauty and assets were legendary. Or even cute Ayame. Maybe that crazy but hot snake lady too; Anko.

Naruto let out an explosive sigh. They were just fantasies. Things that he would dream of, but never experience. Just, wishful thinking that wouldn't solve his loneliness.

"Not necessarily."

"K-kyuubi?!" Naruto exclaimed upon hearing the deep voice inside his head. Despite having had few interactions with the demon fox, he recognized that distinctive rumble, "What do you want? And since when do you speak?"

"Shut it, brat! I'll talk when I feel like it." The Kyuubi snarled back, and the faint image of the beast's fearsome visage appeared in his mind's eye, "And the only reason we're having this conversation is because you need to man up, and stop moping around!"

His eyebrow twitched at the blunt remark. At first, he was interested in what the mighty Tailed Beast had to say, but Naruto found himself growing irritated rather rapidly.

"Oi, my feelings are private, you damn fox!" He yelled back, startling the birds nearby.

But the Kyuubi was having none of it, "Cry me a river, brat. Actually, don't do that, because it's already bad enough in here as it is."

"And what's that supposed to mean?" Naruto was genuinely confused.

"Damn humans... Always oblivious and dumb." Ignoring those additional insults, he focused on what the captive Bijuu said next, "In case you forgot -- which you obviously did -- I am stuck inside your inner world, trapped behind bars. That means I have to live here; a place that reflects your mood. And apparently your inner mind sucks, because I have to live in a goddamn SEWER!"

Ouch. Naruto felt a small pang of pity for the Tailed Beast. As much of an asshole the Kyuubi was, even he didn't deserve to spend all of his time in a sewer. What was even more depressing was the fact that his mind was said sewer.

"Ah, sorry about that. Anything I could do to... you know, make it better?"

The Kyuubi snorted, "At least you're willing to do something about it. Can't say my previous hosts ever did the effort. Yes, you can make my living conditions better by doing something about all of that negativity -- as much as I support it otherwise."

"Well, I can't really shut off my emotions, can I?" Naruto snarked back.

Because seriously, if it was that simple then he wouldn't be here in the first place. How could that stupid fox possibly understand his loneliness?

"Somehow, I know you're insulting me." The Tailed Beast growled in annoyance. Naruto's silence was damning. This time, the Kyuubi sighed, "Anyway, your negativity is caused by your loneliness. As long as you feel this way, I'll be stuck inside this dump, which means that it's in my best interest to help you out."

"Hold up; you want to give me relationship advice and be my wingman?" Naruto's eyes grew as wide as saucers.

There was no immediate response, but his mind was quickly filled with a dull thumping noise. As if someone was banging his head against metal bars.

"No! I mean, yes -- in a certain way." The nine-tailed fox let out an annoyed grunt, before recomposing himself, "What I'm proposing is a little trick of mine. As the strongest of all the Bijuu, I am a pack leader and can make you, my host, the same. By combining my chakra with yours, we can create a chakra virus; capable of turning others into mates."

Naruto blinked in astonishment, "Chakra virus? How does that even work?"

"Simply draw on my chakra and then touch the person you want to be part of your pack. The change is instant, and they'll be both loyal and madly in love with you." The Kyuubi chuckled as if knowing a particularly funny joke, "Plus, the virus affects humans differently. When you infect a woman, she'll have to absorb our combined chakra and this means her reserves will need to be expanded, resulting in her physical strength to increase."

His eyes narrowed into splits, suspicions raised as he asked the Tailed Beast, "What do you mean with that last part."

"Those girls who fall in love with you?" The fox grinned, "They'll all turn into tall, muscular women."

Blood rushed to his cheeks as he stumbled with his words. How did the fox know about his preferences in women?! Naruto was fairly certain no one knew about his secret love for female bodybuilders, and he hadn't told anyone either.

"How?" He simply asked.

Naruto could feel the Kyuubi rolling his red eyes at him, "Oh, please; I'm captive inside you, remember? I know everything about you. Including those magazines you've hidden underneath--"

"Okay! Okay!" Naruto shouted out loud, leaning his head against the bark of the tree in mortification, "You've made your point."

"So what will it be, kid? Do we have a deal?"

Naruto closed his eyes, crossed his arms and hummed loudly, deep in thought on whether or not to accept the Kyuubi's proposal. True, this was the demon fox they were talking about, but was there really a master plan behind it. He'd seen the beast's residence and had to admit it sucked.

And then there were the benefits. A virus that would turn, let's say Sakura-chan, into a musclebound lover? His heart agreed that the companionship was more than welcome. In addition, his lower half stood at attention at the mere mention.

Lots of benefits, if you though about it. Besides, what could the harm be?

"Yosh! You've got yourself a deal!" Naruto cheered.

The Kyuubi's grin was nothing short of shit-eating, "Excellent..."

12311212.content:
As Hinata admired her muscular new figure, she was still amazed by how powerful she felt. She decided that this was surely enough strength to keep her precious Naruto safe from harm. As she was walking toward the door to leave, Tsunade entered and saw her. For a moment, she seemed shocked by Hinata's new muscular form. The busty hokage then began to laugh. Hinata was surprised by this reaction, not to mention fairly annoyed.

"What's so funny?!"

"Nothing really... It's just that you look so different from the shy and petite little ninja I remembered you as..."

"Exactly! I've made myself stronger so that I can protect what's precious to me! Now nobody is ever going to hurt my Naruto again!"

"Oh dear, and you think that a bulky form like this is going to be able to keep anyone safe?"

"What do you mean?"

"Well... Let me just give you a demonstration. Just try to land a blow on me and you'll see what I'm talking about..."

Hinata was getting frustrated by now, and so she charged at Tsunade without hesitation. As she swung her fist to try and punch the much smaller woman, she found her movements to be less fluid than usual. She then realized what Tsunade was trying to say; while she had amplified her own strength with the jutsu, the added bulk from her new muscles made her body more sluggish. In contrast, Tsunade's more streamlined figure was easily able to avoid Hinata's punch. She then drove her point home by landing a powerful blow to Hinata's chest, sending her flying across the room. Hinata crashed into a wall and fainted.

When she came to, Hinata was back to her normal size again. Losing consciousness broke her concentration of the chakra in her muscles, and resulted in her reverting back to normal. Hinata looked up to see the powerful hokage standing next to her. Tsunade bent down by her and smiled.

"I think you see my point now. I guess those muscles weren't completely useless, though. If not for the extra padding, I'm sure my punch would have broken a rib or two."

"Ugh... I don't get it, Lady Tsunade... How can you be so powerful?"

"Well Hinata, I suppose I can show you the secret to my famous superhuman strength. This is a technique I've been teaching to your friend Sakura. You see, I'm able to have all the strength of a stacked bodybuilder because I can control the flow of my chakra perfectly. My body may look slim, but my chakra control amplifies the muscles to unbelievable levels. The key is using only enough chakra to boost them to a toned state, without making them huge enough to inhibit your mobility. After that, just concentrate the rest of your chakra around the muscles rather than inside them."

"I... I think I understand..."

Hinata then stood up and began concentrating her chakra. Just like before, she focused it inside her muscles to make them noticeably toned. Hinata quickly stopped boosting her muscles before the added bulk began to form. She then followed Tsunade's instructions and formed a layer of chakra around her muscles, and she instantly felt a surge of strength. The result of this process was a slimly toned Hinata with all the strength of her earlier bodybuilder stature. Her muscles were still fairly noticeable, but she maintained her feminine figure and all the mobility that came with it.

She immediately smiled as she ran up to hug Tsunade in excitement. This was exactly the kind of power she needed to protect her beloved Naruto.

"Thank you so much, Lady Tsunade! This is incredible!"

"Oh, it's my pleasure Hinata. Now, I have a special mission for you to do!"

"Really? What would that be?" Hinata asked confused.

"Go keep that knucklehead ninja of yours safe!" Tsunade said with a smile and a wink.

"*giggle* Yes mam!"

Hinata then ran out of the building with a smile to go see Naruto. Tsunade simply shook her head with a grin.

"Honestly... I don't know what that girl sees in him..."

She the left the room to return to her duties.

Hinata hummed a tune to herself as she worked diligently at her desk, using her bedroom as her workplace for her little experiment. Her trip to the training grounds had been very fruitful; she'd successfully gathered many different herbs and plants, and a small stop at the local pharmacy had given her even more to work with.

While the young Hyuga heiress was a skilled shinobi, her abilities involving herbal treatments and knowledge were some of the best in the entire village. She knew how to make potent healing salves by using mere flowers.

It was also that knowledge that she was going to use to help her achieve her goal.

"Naruto-kun loves muscular women." She murmured to herself, picking up a few ingredients, "Training my muscles would take years, but if I can make this work, I could get quicker results."

Hinata knew a lot about the properties of certain herbs, including those that granted enhanced stamina and strength. It wasn't uncommon for such stims to be used by ninja; the soldier pill was a prime example. However, those lasted only for a while, but her finished product would be a bit more permanent.

Her theory was quite simple; everyone possessed chakra, which was made out of both physical and spiritual energy. All of that chakra needed to be stored somewhere, namely the body, and she would exploit that connection. The pill that she designed would forcefully expand her chakra reserves, which would then cause her body to make more chakra.

Such medicine already existed, but the difference was that her body would be forced to adjust so it could contain all of that new chakra. That's when her goal would be completed; her muscles would grow exponentially, acting as containers for the chakra.

Said energy would then be permanent, meaning not only would her physical strength increase, but she'd also possess more chakra as well. A tool like this would be revolutionary and a boon to all shinobi.

Hinata was not interested in that, though, as she only had eyes for a certain blonde.

Hours passed by as she experimented. Some of the results were completely useless, while others provided her with valuable insight that she then used to improve her formula. The smell of nature hung in the air, but Hinata was focused solely on her task.

Eventually she smiled as she looked at her final product; a black food pill. One could easily mistake them for the regular soldier pill, but Hinata knew better; this was her miracle work.

All that was left to do was eat it, and become Naruto's dream girl.

"Here goes nothing." She said with pure determination, as she put the pill inside her mouth.

Sakura ended her training session early today, frustrated with her lack of any notable progress. It always bothered her that everyone seemed to always leave her behind, even Hinata had been leaving her in the dust lately. She despised it! She despised her own weakness and having to rely on others while she just stands there and watches from afar, especially when the people closest to her get hurt in the process.

The events of their latest attempts to get their rouge teammate back played clearly in her mind. They had followed a tip that he had been seen roaming the south western border of the wind country. Though his purpose for being there was unknown, the information they received, along side some reconnaissance, was proven to be valid. Naturally, the members of team seven jumped at this rare chance.

After traveling many miles and fighting off the occasional bandit, they had finally made to their destination were they almost immediately encountered their objective.
After a brief exchange of words they entered combat with their former teammate. They fought valiantly but despite their best efforts , they simply weren't able to catch him and he once more slipped through their fingers. All the while Sakura could only stand by and watch as Naruto and her beloved Sasuke fought each again, Naruto sustaining significant damage in the process.

Back to the present, Sakura screamed in anger and frustration as she delivered a mighty blow to one of the wooden training posts that peppered the field, shattering it into splinters in the process.

Sakura had slumped onto the ground, curling into a ball as depression and self loathing began to consume her thoughts when she suddenly recalled a memory from the day of their graduation from the ninja academy.

Naruto had been struggling with the clone jutsu until that fateful night when he saved Iruka sensei from from an attack by unleashing the shadow clone jutsu. If she remembered correctly, Naruto had said he learned it from a scroll he stole from the forbidden archives. It was then that Sakura got an idea. She would break into the forbidden archives and steal a scroll herself! Surely there was a Jutsu that could make her stronger. There was the risk of getting caught and severely reprimanded, but at this point she was ready to try anything. With renewed spirits, Sakura jumped up to feet and left for home to prepare for her personal secret mission.

Hours had passed and the day turned into night. Sakura had made all the necessary preparations. She thanked her good fortune that the majority of the Anbu black-ops Were away on a very important mission at the moment and therefore leaving the archives relatively unguarded. Otherwise this little incursion of hers would be nigh insurmountably challenging.
It was simple enough, all she had to do was exploit the blind spots in the security, though there were a couple close calls. When she finally made it to the file room where all the villages most sensitive information was stored. After searching for a bit, she found the archives. The pink haired kunoichi looked on in silent wonder as she beheld entire shelves full to the brim with tones of forbidden and dangerous knowledge. She started to second guess her decision at this point but quickly shook that thought away. She had come to far to turn back now and she wasn't going back empty handed.
She combed through scroll after scroll, most were either too dangerous or not what she wanted. After many anxiety filled hours she finally found what she wanted! A jutsu that can make her stronger!
She opened the scroll and read it carefully, hungry to claim it secrets. According to the scroll, the technique works by increasing the body's potential for growth and physical development as well as expand it’s capacity to generate and retain vast amounts of chakra every time it's used by using yin-yang release to actively warp reality around and within the user. This excited Sakura, now she could finally catch up with everyone! Maybe even ,she dared to think, surpass them.

What should she do next?

Shizune hummed to herself while going over a few unread documents sitting at top of Tsunade’s desk. Tsunade herself had been called away to a special classified meeting taking place out in the Sand Village.

Shizune despite being the older woman’s aide didn’t know much about the details but shot in the dark that perhaps it had to deal with continuing the now re-strengthened partnership the two villages had with one another. It was rather surprising to her that she wouldn’t be needed this time around instead Tsunade had left her behind to watch over things.

It should be said she wasn’t an intern-leader or anything her personal job position was the same as before…just with less of her boss around so things were pretty quiet and simplistic at times Sakura would come around the younger girl agreeing to help Shizune if she needed anything done, not much different from before when she would happily help her out actually.

As she finished the paperwork Shizune sighed softly she had to admit, with a bit of chuckle, that with Tsunade not around things were definitely easier on her personal mental and physical health but at the same time she wasn’t used to having this much free time on her hands…

Perhaps it was the boredom influencing her thoughts but the raven-haired woman began to think over how strong her superior was and how she had taught Sakura those same techniques, not that she was jealous of the pink-haired girl or anything like that she was just thinking on the spot is all. A part of her wondered what it would be like to have the blonde woman’s strength sure she was pretty strong in her own right she had to be in order for her to deal with everything Tsunade-related…man was she glad to be getting this sort of peace…anyway curiosity got the better of her and mostly to remove her boredom Shizune decided to…

15533211.content:
For as long as he could remember the villagers of the leaf seemingly hated Naruto Uzumaki, why he couldn't say and no one ever bothered to mention why either. It was all very confusing for the poor boy until one day everything changed.

Being the goofball that he was Naruto tried out a new jutsu which completely changed his entire gender. Suddenly Naruto was no more and he was now a she by the name of Naruko, apparently not putting too much thought into a new name. Afterwards Naruko headed out and surprisingly did not receive the same hatred she had prior to her gender-flip, perhaps it was despite the same blonde hair and blue eyes the long twin-tails and obvious female curves made her appear similar yet completely different especially to people who weren't really familiar with her.

This gave Naruko a sort of new lease on life. She still had the same dream of earning everyone's respect by becoming Hokage but it definitely helped that there was less hatred directed toward her...

"Gotta...be...ready..." Naruko stated through spaced out grunts as she performed several pull-ups with a bar placed in between her closet door.

With the villagers being less resentful of her, she still did stupid things on occasion that got her heat, Naruko was able to focus on her studies however changing gender did nothing to improve her intelligence so she still struggled. Thankfully getting a hold of clone jutsu thanks to an incident involving Iruka-Sensai several days ago.

Dropping down to the floor Naruko wiped the sweat from her brow having completed a brief workout before heading off the academy. Today she was going to be assigned to a team and she could hardly contain her excitement, secretly hoping she'd be paired up with her crush, grabbing her bright orange jacket she smiled as she spotted her reflection in a nearby mirror.

She was still young so her curves were still developing but what made her smile was how lean and muscular she was for her age. Her biceps and thighs strong yet not freakish and a hint of a set of abs appearing just above her waist. She looked good and she felt good so after a quick visit to clean up in her bathroom Naruko ready for the day made her way out of her home and towards the ninja academy.

On the way after a quick stop for a meal of ramen however Naruko accidentally ran into one of her fellow classmates still on their way to the academy as well.
15533211.title: Goodbye Naruto, hello Naruko Uzumaki!

155332111.content:
"Hey Naruko!"

The blonde's lips perking upward as she overheard the sound of her crush calling out to her. Running up to her side Sakura Haruno paused as she greeted Naruko once more. The blonde blushing slightly as she remembered how the pink-haired girl wouldn't even give her the time of day during her "previous" life but now she was as close to Sakura as the girl's other bestie, Ino, was. A vast improvement for sure!

"Geez I'm the one out of breath trying to catch up to you and you're the one with the rosy cheeks! You okay, Naruko?"

The thoughts suddenly interrupted and realigned as she muttered a quick excuse about how she got some training done before leaving home.

"Well you're definitely one of the stronger girls in class but remember you have to train your mind as well."

Naruko agreed with a slight chuckle as she rubbed the back of her head.

"After all you'll never find a guy if you don't work both your body and your brain." Sakura stated proudly as Naruko gave her a bit of a puzzled look.

"Oh! I mean...if you...well...that's okay too! I'm just saying is all."

The girl's face matching her hair-color as the blonde simply laughed at her predicament earning a slight punch on the shoulder, she was sure in her other life things would have turned out very differently.

"Anyway" Sakura paused taking in a breath or two to control her blush, "there's still a little time before class so how about this. I help you with school work and you help me...um improve my muscles."

"You wanna get stronger?" The blonde asked honestly curious.

"Well yeah especially if I get paired today with...him."

Naruko knew who Sakura meant and it took everything in her not to glare at the thought of that boy. Her rival for Sakura's affection even though that guy didn't seem to give a damn about anything or anyone...

'What the hell does she see in that jerk...'

She pondered for a moment before turning her attention back to Sakura so the girl wouldn't be concerned that she was spacing out on her again.

"Okay we can do that but please Sakura get strong because you want to not because"

"Heh it's okay I know how stupid it sounds but he's not the only reason we're going to be real full-time ninjas soon and I don't want to hold my team back. You know what I mean."

Naruko nodded as she grabbed Sakura's shoulders explaining that with her help they could both be strong ninjas. Sakura blush returning a bit as she chuckled at the blonde's excitement.

"And I'll make sure we're both smart enough to use the right jutsus!"

She tried to match her friend's excitement but simply couldn't bring herself to do without bursting into a laughing fit.

"Yeah! Now let's go!"

"Woah!"

Sakura struggling a tad as Naruko practically dragged her away by the wrist!

info.brief_description: The girls of Naruto have been working out, and it is really starting to show!
info.description:
Alright, this story is a response to the serious lack of muclse growth stories. Basically, one, some, or all of the girls of Naruto are growing huge muscles, for various reasons, and the guys are having varring reactions.

Okay, so, while I would like to see a bit of romance between the characters (especially Naruto and Hinata) it is by no means necessary.

My usual rules apply: keep it logical, avoid killing characters, always offer as many choices as possible, don't end the story, be extremely descriptive, and use good grammer and spelling
